occupation: Co-Founder and Chief Financial Officer at Propel Holdings Inc. at Propel Holdings
headline: CFO and Co-Founder of Propel Holdings
summary: A strategic financial leader, Sheldon has played a lead role in shaping and guiding Propel’s growth since 2011. As Co-Founder and CFO of Propel, Sheldon has built and oversees all financial operations, including accounting and reporting, treasury, financial strategy and planning, commercial and transaction structuring, audit, and corporate finance. Bringing with him over 18 years of global experience in building organizations and leading finance teams, Sheldon is dedicated to driving profitable, sustainable growth and delivering value to shareholders.

experiences.title: Co-Founder and Chief Financial Officer at Propel Holdings Inc.
Acting Finance Director
experiences.description:
Raising Capital, Commercial Deal Structuring, Investor & Board Relations, Management of all Financial Affairs, Head of Finance Function, Long-Term Vision/Corporate Strategy

CInergy (Rebranded as Conversity Ltd in 2015) specializes in Competitive Intelligence Software Consulting and Technology Solutions.  Focus is on delivering customer acquisition and retention solutions to Mobile Network Operators.  Furthermore, through its launch of ‘Mobilife.com’ CInergy offers end customers the ability to identify a ‘tailor-made’ mobile deal that suits an individual based on his/her specific usage patterns

experiences.title: Corporate Transactions Specialist
experiences.description: Deal Structuring, Financial Modelling and Valuation, Business Case Development, Closing Major Client Transactions

experiences.title: Client Financial Management
experiences.description: Financial Management and Analysis, Financial Modelling and Reporting, Managing Team of Financial Analysts and Large Portfolio of Client Engagements

education.school: Schulich School of Business - York University
